greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of steps to reach 0 under "k->max product of two numbers whose concatenation is k".
link: Scott R. Shannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000.
mathematica: f[n_] := If[n<10, 0, With[{d = IntegerDigits[n]}, Table[FromDigits[Take[d, k]]*FromDigits[Drop[d, k]], {k, 1, Length[d]-1}] // Max]];
results.author: _Erich Friedman_
